item.title: By: Shin
item.dc:creator: Shin
item.description:
You know what's funny? Upon Blizzard Europe's requests Vivendi stoped selling WoW to distributers untill they have the new cluster up and running. And Bulgaria's reps of VUG are all out. So if you want to get wow here, you have to buy an account from someone, or wait till april or something. I'm guessing that's the situation in other low-priority territories as well :)
You just have to love them, now they won't even take people's money.
